author: Hannah Fry
description:
#ad
Younger generations (myself firmly included of course 💅) are trusting more of their lives to online services than ever. Amazing for convenience, slightly less amazing for our collective 'wait, is this legit' anxiety levels.
 
Luckily @Mastercard is on it - staying ahead of the scammers, spotting threats before they land, and shaping smarter protection for a future where we can all connect with confidence
title: #ad @Mastercard and connecting with confidence
